players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and Bob is mafia. We need to act fast."

Diana: "I am unsure of Bob's role but will keep an eye on him. 
"
Charlie: "I will continue to investigate and gather more information. We need to be cautious of Bob's actions."
You: "Let's stay vigilant. I know my role, but I'll play it carefully to avoid suspicion."
Diana: "I will continue to support Charlie's efforts and keep an eye on Bob. Let's work together to uncover the truth."
